Posts.Content: Mar 23, 2011 10:48PM JenniferVice wrote: In the same boat doing the dame thing..going crazy waiting. Tomorrow (March 24) is my double mastectomy. The stage II cancer is just in my left breast but I have a strong family history and don't want to do this song and dance again. I don't know yet if lymph nodes are involved. I will probably find out tomorrow, the longest day of my life. My healthcare is rather expensive, but I am lucky to have two loving parents willing to help me emotionally and financially.
Posts.Title: going crazy waiting debbsie Shirlann
